Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Merchandise Mart
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Merchandise Mart due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Merchandise Mart due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ogden/Western
ShortDescription: SB 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Ogden, California, Cermak & Western due to street blockage near Ogden/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Ogden, California, Cermak, then resume their normal route on Western due to street blockage near Ogden/Western.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Ogden/Western
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th/18th buses are rerouted via Ogden, California, Cermak, Western and 18th then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Ogden/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Ogden, California, Cermak, Western and 18th then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Ogden/Western.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
